  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100708</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100708</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Purification of rock salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung des Felsensalzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Purification de sel de roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Purification do sal da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Purificazione del sale della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρισμός του άλατος βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Purificación de la sal de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the first of four illustrations showing the steps to purify rock salt. Rock salt is crushed into a fine powder.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">powder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das erste von vier Abbildungen, welche 
die Jobsteps zeigen, um Felsensalz zu reinigen. Felsensalz wird 
in ein feines Puder zerquetscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le premier de quatre illustrations montrant
les étapes pour épurer le sel de roche. Du sel de roche est 
écrasé dans une poudre fine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o primeiro de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram as etapas para purify o sal da rocha. O sal da rocha é 
esmagado em um pó fino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prima di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i punti per purificare il sale della roccia. Il sale 
della roccia è schiacciato in una polvere fine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η πρώτη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τα βήματα για να καθαρίσει το άλας βράχου. Το 
άλας βράχου συντρίβεται σε μια λεπτή σκόνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el primer de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los pasos de progresión para purificar la sal de la roca. 
La sal de la roca se machaca en un polvo fino.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsensalz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poudre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sel de roche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">purification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sal da rocha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polvere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">purificazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sale della roccia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκόνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθαρισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άλας βράχου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polvo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">purificación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sal de la roca</string>
          </keyword>
